Description.Text: The hotel is only a short drive away from Los Angeles International Airport, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Los Angeles Zoo, Dodger Stadium and other popular destinations. (0606/CH)

The hotel is centrally located in the heart of Los Angeles on the famous Wilshire Boulevard. It is three miles west of Downtown, 2 miles south of Hollywood, 4 miles East of Beverly Hills, and just 11 miles to Los Angeles best beaches. Hollywood landmarks, which include Mann's Chinese Theater and the Hollywood Walk of Fame, are within a 10-minute drive. The Los Angeles Convention Center, the new Staples Center Arena and downtown is just 3 miles East. Miracle Mile Museums and theaters are just 2 miles to the West.
The hotel offer guestrooms and suites, many with a view of the Hollywood Hills and each with a floor-to-ceiling windows. Non-smoking and handicapped-accessible guestrooms are also available.

The hotel has two award-winning restaurants. A Japanese restaurant serves a more exotic menu with sushi and teppan-yaki bars. The other restaurant features a creative collection of Continental and California dishes. The delicious made to order pasta bar, is a popular luncheon choice. The restaurant also offers homemade desserts, soups and a selection of the freshest salads.
The lobby is very large and elegant with marble flooring and pillars, a large reception desk and seating area.
